# Cyako.go
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/Cyako/Cyako.go.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/Cyako/Cyako.go)

Cyako in golang backend. Work in progress.

 Still in a very early stage.

- [x] service support
- [ ] authentication service
- [ ] cache service
- [ ] reconnect issues
- [ ] realtime app apis
- [ ] examples and guides
